name: PlotBeam
author: Notitia

sections.description:
​
Our innovative plugin brings a new level of convenience and ease to Qlik Sense users, enabling them to effortlessly enter a Qlik Sense object ID and visualise data. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, our plugin enhances the data visualisation experience without compromising on security.
​

How it works

To create a Plot Beam visualisation, select the Plot Beam WordPress block from the administrator console and enter your Qlik Sense App & Object IDs.
​

​
Select your plot type, and enter a title and/or description for your visualisation.
​

​
Upon saving, a visualisation will be created as below:
​

​

Privacy

Authentication is handled by Plot Guard service, which connects to your Qlik Sense environment securely, and passes only select public-facing data to your WordPress site.
​
To sign up to Plot Guard, please visit https://www.notitia.consulting
​
View our Data Security Policy [here](/assets/Data Security Policy v1.4 WordPress.pdf/)
View our Terms and Conditions [here](/assets/General Terms & Conditions WordPress.pdf/)
​

Help & Queries

For help or to submit a query, please visit our Client Portal
sections.installation:
​
1. Place our plugin folder in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or upload the plugin zip file through the WordPress admin dashboard.
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
​
